short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best Friend Tab is a Chrome Extension designed for enhancing your New Tab experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform every new tab into a joyful escape with Best Friend Tab! This Chrome extension brightens your day with a random selection of the cutest dog wallpapers. Whether you're a fan of fluffy puppies or noble hounds, each new tab offers a fresh, adorable surprise that's sure to bring a smile to your face.

This extension is free to download from the Chrome Web store, and you can uninstall it at any time.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the: Best Friend Tab extension and setting chrome new tab search provider to Yahoo as described by the service in terms of use https://bestfriendtab.com/terms, and Privacy Policy https://bestfriendtab.com/privacy
